short_description: Outputs coefficients of the linear model represented by the input matrices.
long_description: Outputs coefficients of the linear model represented by the input matrices. The 0th coefficient corresponds to the slope intercept.

input_tables.name: input
input_tables.rDescription: Input table that contains one row for each data point and one column for each data point component
input_tables.description: Input table that contains one row for each data point and one column for each data point component
